pushbutton.label: Grant Listed Options for This Application

table.label: Objects
table.whereclause: groupname is null and attributename is null

table.label: Attributes
table.whereclause: groupname is null and attributename is not null

helpgrid.innerhtml: The table window below displays all records that match the queries specified for this data group. Members of this security group will then be able to download these records to their devices.
The settings below do not apply to the current Security Group, but rather apply to all users of the mobile Work Management application.

pushbutton.clickmessage: Work Management settings have been saved.
pushbutton.label: OK

helpgrid.innerhtml: The settings below do not apply to the current Security Group, but rather apply to all users of the mobile Inventory application.
